transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Good afternoon, ma'am.
Customer: Good afternoon, sir.
Executive: Kaise ho aap?
Customer: Ji badhiya, aap bataiye.
Executive: Main bhi badhiya. Aapko ek call aaya hoga, yeh jo concern tha na ki call nahi land kar raha aapke number pe?
Customer: Ji ji, aap IndiaMART se baat kar rahe hain na?
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji, haan ji, main IndiaMART se baat kar raha hoon.
Customer: Ji ji. To abhi yeh, abhi dekhiye yeh aapka theek ho gaya hai. Agar aage aapko koi concern aata hai ki aapke number pe dobara se call land nahi ho raha hai to aap mujhe bataiyega, theek hai?
Customer: Haan sir ji.
Executive: Theek hai, aapko koi aapka woh sir woh number bataiye jo sir lag jaaye kyunki na kabhi kabhi hum problem aati hai hum
Customer: Ek minute rukiye, ek minute rukiye. number lete hain na woh aata nahi hai phir call nahi lagti uski.
Executive: Main aapko, main aapko apna number share kar raha hoon. Aap ek baar yeh wala number bataiyega, 85 kya hai, 8 85955 859
Customer: 55 6787
Executive: 6787
Customer: Haan ji, aapka good name kya hai sir?
Executive: Deepak Mehta. Main abhi aapko apne WhatsApp pe hi likh kar ke bhej raha hoon, us number pe aap mujhe call kar lijiyega.
Customer: Main aapko send kar dungi, theek hai na? Achha sir dashboard pe jaake jo number jo do number aate hain na, unpe call karte hain na to phir woh receive nahi karte, matlab kya kuch na kuch dikkat aati hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Hmm. Aap na mujhe directly mujhe call kar lijiyega. Actually kya hai ki abhi sir aapka account main hi handle karunga. Aapne abhi naya services liya na?
Customer: Achha, ji ji.
Executive: Aapne yeh service li hai, domain wala service li hai. Theek hai? To abhi, abhi se aapka, haan, abhi se aapka catalog main hi handle karunga. Aapne premium services li hai uske liye. Aur ek update aur chahiye tha mujhe ma'am, aapke catalog pe temporarily block laga hua hai, temp block laga hua hai, shayad balance payment clear nahi hai.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Haan haan, iske liye main har sir se baat kar leta hoon. Primary number hai na sir ka?
Customer: Haan wohi hai sir woh wala jo upar number tha. 91100 wala.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai, main yeh aapka concern close kar deta hoon. Aap yeh wala mail mail ID access kar paate hain jo Mahadev Engineering pe primary mail ID hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi, woh to sir ke paas hi hai.
Executive: Achha. Actually kya hai ki mera, actually kya hai ki mera ek feedback aayega us mail pe. To aap usko satisfied mark kar dete to mere paas feedback achha positive aata.
Customer: Nahi woh to sir ke paas hi hai sir.
Executive: Achha theek hai, theek hai. Sir se bol dijiyega ek baar ki unke paas mail aayega to satisfied mark kar de.
Customer: Achha achha, theek hai. Aapka Deep Mehta hai, Deepak Mehta hai sir?
Executive: Deepak.mehta@indiamart.com. Main mail ID bhi daal deta hoon aapko.
Customer: Deepak. Theek hai, okay sir.
Executive: Theek hai. Main yeh concern abhi aapka save kar liya sir na?
Customer: Haan haan haan. IndiaMART aap hi use karte hain ma'am?
Customer: Haan ji sir. Ek ladki aur hai sir woh bhi.
Executive: Aapka shubh naam?
Customer: Mera Rakhi hai sir.
Executive: Rakhi?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai Rakhi ma'am, main aapko call karta hoon isi number pe. Mujhe services ka discussion bhi karna hai lekin pehle main aapki services activate kara loon.
Customer: Okay sir, okay, theek hai.
Executive: Okay, okay. Thank you so much Rakhi ma'am.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's calls not landing on their number.

- Unable to receive calls from dashboard numbers.

- Catalog temporarily blocked due to payment issue.

- Executive needs positive feedback on a mail.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the call landing issue is resolved.

- Shared personal number for direct contact.

- Will handle the customer's account and catalog.

- Will discuss the payment issue with the relevant team.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to ask sir to mark satisfied on mail.

- Executive will call to discuss services.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- call landing, catalog, payment, feedback, services
